meaning: Are you crazy? / Prepare for drug test
description: Sarcastic remark implying someone is acting crazy (like on drugs).

examples.chinese: 是不是脑子短路了,准备药检吧你
examples.translation: Brain short-circuit? Prepare for drug test (Go seek help)

examples.chinese: 这个人真的准备药检吧
examples.translation: This person really needs a drug test (is crazy)

examples.chinese: 我怀疑你们精神状态,准备药检
examples.translation: Doubt your mental state, prepare for drug test
